name: Mug Cake

ingredients.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or Dip Mix of your choice

ingredients.name: vegetable oil, or coconut oil or butter
Tutti Fruity or Cocoa Crunch Whole Food Topper

preparation: In a low, wide mug that holds at least 1 cup, combine flour, Summer Berry Dip Mix, and baking powder. Add milk, oil, and vanilla.
Using a fork, gently stir until no lumps remain.
Microwave on high for 45–50 seconds. Let cool 5 min; cake will continue cooking as it cools.
Top with yogurt; garnish with topper. For a punch of green, add fresh mint if you wish.
tips: It’s better to slightly undercook cake so it has a gooey texture rather than end up with a tough, overcooked cake.
